snippet: Work on an office building next to a 17th-century Flushing meetinghouse was halted after congregants complained about the construction company digging into an adjacent graveyard.
abstract: Work on an office building next to a 17th-century Quaker meetinghouse in Flushing, Queens, is halted after congregants complain that the construction company, Pinnacle Engineering PC, dug into an adjacent graveyard.
lead_paragraph: Work on an office building next to a 17th-century Flushing meetinghouse was halted after congregants complained about the construction company digging into an adjacent graveyard.

headline.seo: Quakers Say Contractors Desecrated Queens Cemetery
headline.main: Quakers Say Contractors Desecrated a Historic Queens Graveyard
headline.print_headline: Quakers Say Contractors Desecrated Historic Graves
